name: Vortex
description: Vortex by TGA Genetics is a 80/20 sativa-dominant strain whose potency will pull you into a whirling mass of euphoria like a cosmic riptide. Its celestial parents Space Queen and Apollo 13 pass on a sweet and sour lemon aroma accented by notes of tropical mango, while its inherited effects can range from racy and energetic to heavy and disorienting. The staggering THC content of Vortex has won this sativa several awards including High Times' Best Sativa in 2010 and the High Times "Top 10" in 2007.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Euphoric, Relaxed, Happy, Energetic, Fatigue, Stress, Headaches, Depression, Pain, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Headache, Dizzy, Anxious
